name: Rayman Arena

files.RaymanMEXE: N/A:Select the widescreen fixed EXE (RaymanM.exe). Can be downloaded here: https://www.mediafire.com/file/4hpf239nsvlidv7/Rayman_M_EXE_Widescreen_Fix.7z/file

files.Videos: N/A:Select the widescreen fixed video archive (Rayman M Widescreen Videos.7z). Can be downloaded here: https://www.mediafire.com/file/80opgd1ue432nv5/Rayman_M_Widescreen_Videos.7z/file

content:
files:
- RaymanMEXE: 'N/A:Select the widescreen fixed EXE (RaymanM.exe). Can be downloaded
    here: https://www.mediafire.com/file/4hpf239nsvlidv7/Rayman_M_EXE_Widescreen_Fix.7z/file'
- Videos: 'N/A:Select the widescreen fixed video archive (Rayman M Widescreen Videos.7z).
    Can be downloaded here: https://www.mediafire.com/file/80opgd1ue432nv5/Rayman_M_Widescreen_Videos.7z/file'
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Rayman M/RaymanM.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert CD 1
    requires: RaymanM.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: RaymanMEXE
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s language:'
    id: LANG
    options:
    - English: English
    - French: French
    - German: German
    - Spanish: Spanish
    - Italian: Italian
    - Swedish: Swedish
    - Finnish: Finnish
    - Norwegian: Norwegian
    - Danish: Danish
    preselect: English
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: $DISC/binkw32.dll
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: $DISC/DX8_Detect_RM.ini
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: $DISC/RaymanM.ico
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: $DISC/RM_Setup_DX8.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M
    src: $DISC/stlport_vc6.4.1.b6.dll
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/DX8_LOC
    src: $DISC/DX8_LOC
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/FishBin
    src: $DISC/FishBin
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/MenuBin
    src: $DISC/MenuBin
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/TribeBin
    src: $DISC/TribeBin
- insert-disc:
    description: Insert CD 2
    requires: CD2.exe
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/FishBin
    src: $DISC/FishBin
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/MenuBin
    src: $DISC/MenuBin
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/TribeBin
    src: $DISC/TribeBin
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/Videos
    file: Videos
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/UbiSoft/ubi.ini
    key: Language
    section: RAYMANM
    value: $INPUT_LANG
- task:
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Rayman M/RM_Setup_DX8.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/windows/UbiSoft/ubi.ini
    key: Gli_Mode
    section: RAYMANM
    value: 1 - 1920 x 1080 x 32
